string.text:
Action plan for Military
 
Personnel:
Commander operations: signal 'Quartet'
Seven landing assault troops: 'Peregrine', 'Kite', 'Hawk', 'Kestrel', 'Harrier', 'Accipiter', 'Vulture'
Sniper calculation: 'Owl'
Support:
Air: Second half of the 18th, 30th, 31st, 48th, 49th
Air: First half of the 64th, 65th, 98th, 97th
Land: Battleship-1, Battleship-2, Battleship-3
Situation: Possible strong resistance on the bridge (23, 45), the gate (26, 78), the road along the main building of the station (12, 23-53, 76). Possible use of heavy weapons by the enemy
Expected number of enemies 70-100. Presence of armoured vehicles - none
Possible heavy sniper cover
Weather: Visibility - 700. There may be a previously unknown anomaly
